name: ‎‎
description:
INSTRUCTIONS ON DOWNLOADING-

You need to download the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP from this website or else the game won't run. https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/run-time-package

Scroll down and click on "RPG Maker VX Ace". It'll give you instructions on what to do. 

After that, you can extract the game folder and start playing.

If you want to run this on a Mac/Apple Computer, you'll have to use an extension like Boot Camp to run it. https://support.apple.com/boot-camp

Your computer may say it's harmful or something, I swear to God I'm not trying to hack you. RPG Maker files just do that.

Note- This game does not have a save feature. Once you exit out, you'll have to restart. The main focus of this game is to explore, so there's no need for save files.

All art and tilesets were made by me.

Yes, this game is not supposed to make any sense. Enjoy! :D
